content.summary: A responsive, content-first design system utilizing atomic principles to support real-time feeds and multimedia interactions.
content.description: The visual philosophy prioritizes content legibility and interaction speed. Using a 'Clean Modern' aesthetic, the interface minimizes chrome to let user-generated content shine. The color palette uses a deep Indigo primary for trust and stability, with vibrant accents for interactions. The layout adopts a classic 3-column structure (Navigation, Feed, Widgets) optimized for desktop, collapsing to a bottom-nav single column on mobile. Optimistic UI patterns are heavily employed to mask network latency.

component_specs.name: PostCard
component_specs.description: The primary unit of content in the feed, displaying user info, media, and actions.

component_specs.name: CreatePostComposer
component_specs.description: A rich input area allowing text entry, media attachment, and emoji selection.

component_specs.name: ChatWindow
component_specs.description: Real-time messaging interface with history and input.

content.information_architecture: The application uses a flat hierarchy with a persistent side navigation on desktop and bottom navigation on mobile. The primary view is the 'Feed', with secondary views for 'Explore', 'Notifications', and 'Messages'. Contextual actions (like creating a post) are available globally via a Floating Action Button (mobile) or prominent header button (desktop).
content.layout_strategy: Responsive 3-column grid (Left Nav, Center Content, Right Widgets) collapsing to 1-column on mobile.
content.responsive_strategy: Mobile-first approach using Tailwind CSS breakpoints. Complex components like the 'ChatWindow' transform from a floating widget on desktop to a full-screen page on mobile.
content.visual_philosophy: Clean, whitespace-heavy design that emphasizes user content over UI chrome. Uses a cool color palette to reduce eye strain during prolonged usage.
